parameters.jsCode:
// Prepare db_queries for Execute_Queries sub-workflow
return {
  json: {
    ctx: {
      ...$json.ctx,
      db_queries: [
        {
          key: 'projection_data',
          sql: `WITH target_event AS (
  -- Find the event for this Discord message
  SELECT id, payload, received_at, payload->>'message_url' as message_url
  FROM events
  WHERE payload->>'discord_message_id' = $1
    AND event_type = 'discord_message'
  ORDER BY received_at DESC
  LIMIT 1
),
bot_reply_projections AS (
  -- Find projections for a bot reply message (no LIMIT - one message can have multiple)
  SELECT p.id, p.trace_id, p.event_id, p.projection_type, p.data, p.status, p.quality_score, p.created_at, p.timezone
  FROM projections p
  WHERE (p.metadata->>'message_id' = $1 
     OR p.data->>'discord_message_id' = $1
     OR p.data->>'summary_message_id' = $1)
    AND p.status IN ('auto_confirmed', 'confirmed', 'pending')
),
relevant_projections AS (
  -- Get projections either from the event or the bot reply
  SELECT p.id as projection_id, p.trace_id, p.event_id, p.projection_type, p.data, p.status, p.quality_score, p.created_at, p.timezone
  FROM projections p
  WHERE p.event_id = (SELECT id FROM target_event)
    AND p.status IN ('auto_confirmed', 'confirmed', 'pending')
  UNION
  SELECT id, trace_id, event_id, projection_type, data, status, quality_score, created_at, timezone
  FROM bot_reply_projections
),
relevant_traces AS (
  -- Get ONLY the traces linked to these projections (not all traces for the event)
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (t.id)
    t.id as trace_id,
    t.event_id,
    COALESCE(t.data->>'prompt', t.data->>'input') as prompt_text,
    t.data->>'completion' as output_text,
    t.data->>'model' as model,
    (t.data->>'duration_ms')::numeric as duration_ms,
    t.created_at as trace_created_at
  FROM traces t
  WHERE t.id IN (SELECT trace_id FROM relevant_projections WHERE trace_id IS NOT NULL)
  ORDER BY t.id, t.created_at DESC
)
SELECT 
  COALESCE((SELECT id FROM target_event), (SELECT event_id FROM bot_reply_projections LIMIT 1)) as event_id,
  (SELECT payload->>'original_text' FROM target_event) as original_text,
  (SELECT message_url FROM target_event) as message_url,
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT json_agg(rp.*) FROM relevant_projections rp),
    '[]'::json
  ) as projections,
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT json_agg(rt.*) FROM relevant_traces rt),
    '[]'::json
  ) as traces`,
          params: ['$json.ctx.event.message_id']
        }
      ]
    }
  }
};
